parameters: \n<Eury>It looks like this is the deepest part of the base...
ルイン立ち絵　通常
ルイン立ち絵 驚き

\n<Eury>I sensed the presence of monsters. What about you? What are
you doing here?
ルイン立ち絵 驚き
\n<???>...Wait. If you've entered this room, then!!!
\n<Eury>I have defeated it. It's my duty to defeat monsters.
\n<Eury>You seem to know something about that monster.

\n<Eury>There shouldn't be any more monsters capable of creating
others. What was that thing!?

\n<Ruin>The mechanical monster in this base... That was a
\C[24]Manoroid\C[0] that I developed.
\n<Ruin>The Mamono Core... It's the energy core that creates them.
\n<Eury>What are you thinking!? You're human, aren't you!?

\n<Ruin>...Yes, I am indeed human. I also have a name,
\C[24]Ruin\C[0].
\n<Ruin>I... betrayed humanity and sided with the monsters.
ルイン立ち絵　通常
\n<Ruin>...Eury. Your mission is the destruction of monsters.

\n<Ruin>I created the Manoroids and thus made it possible for
monsters to be born into the world again. Me...
\n<Ruin>\C[18]Are you going to kill me here?
\n<Eury>However, hurting people is not my mission.
\n<Ruin>Please deliver this letter to my detested old friend.

\n<Ruin>Her name is \C[24]Marion\C[0]. You must be quite familiar
with her.
\n<Eury>Dr. Marion's friend!? Then why would you create monsters!!
ルイン立ち絵　通常

\n<Ruin>Everything is written in that letter. It's a manifestation
of my hesitation.
\n<Ruin>...If she finds out, she'll erase me.

\n<Ruin>I will hide in Tengeki Street for a while. I won't return
here again.
\n<Eury>Wait! What are you going to do now...?
\n<Ruin>I don't know. What should I do from now on?
\n<Ruin>Maybe there's no method left for me anymore.
